summary: The Contoso Wireless TV is a great choice for those who want to enjoy the best of both streaming and cable. It has features such as 4K Ultra HD resolution, voice search remote control, Dolby Vision HDR technology, built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, and Chromecast built-in. It also has Dolby Atmos audio technology for an immersive sound experience and comes with a one year warranty with 24/7 customer service and technical support.
